mosinstall.name: Display News
mosinstall.author: Rey Gigataras (4.5.1 mod. AlexeyD) reworked by BK
mosinstall.copyright: This Module is released under the GNU/GPL License
mosinstall.description: Show a number of Content items from a specified section or category, with extensive parameters controlling what is displayed

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: set_count
param.label: Set count
param.description: Set how many items you wish to have displayed. Default is 5. 0 is unlimited

param.name: minus_leadind
param.label: Minus leadind
param.description: Parameter that allows you have a certain number of the initial items not to be displayed (E.g. the first 2, or 5 items will not be shown)

param.name: use_format
param.label: Use format string for output content items

param.name: format
param.label: Format
param.description:
Format string tags: %s - section,
%c - category, %d - date,
%a - author, %t - title,
%i - intro text, %f - full text

param.name: set_date_today
param.label: Set date today
param.description: Only the items published today will be displayed

param.name: set_date_range
param.label: Set date range
param.description: Items published today to an x number of days previously

param.name: set_date_month
param.label: Set date month
param.description: Parameter that specifies that only the items published for the current month or a specific month will be displayed

param.name: set_date_year
param.label: Set date year
param.description: Parameter that specifies that only the items published for the current year or a specific year will be displayed. “0” will show the current years items. To show a specific year you must enter the year as a 4 digit number.

param.name: set_section_id
param.label: Set section
param.description: By selection a Section, you limit the items displayed to those from the particular Section

param.name: set_section_id_extra
param.label: Additional section ID
param.description: By entering a additional Section Id number, you extend list the items displayed to those from the particular Section. You can enter a SET of IDs.

param.name: set_category_id
param.label: Set category
param.description: By selectiong a Category, you limit the Items displayed to those from the particular Category. You can enter a SET of Names.

param.name: set_category_id_extra
param.label: Additional category ID
param.description: By entering a additional Category Id number, you extent list the Items displayed to those from the particular Category. You can enter a SET of IDs.

param.name: set_author_id
param.label: Set author ID
param.description: By entering a Author Id number, you limit the Items displayed to those created by that particular Author Id. You can enter a SET of IDs.

param.name: set_author_name
param.label: Set author name
param.description: By entering a Author Name, you limit the Items displayed to those created by that particular Author Name. You can enter a SET of Names.

param.name: set_author_alias
param.label: Set author alias
param.description: By entering a Author Alias, you limit the Items displayed to those created by that particular Author Alias. You can enter a SET of Aliass

param.name: set_auto_author
param.label: Set auto author
param.description: By setting to y (yes) the module will automatically detect the Author of the item you are viewing and will display the Items by that particular Author.This function will only be active on a item page (task = view)For non items pages (front page, component pages, typed content pages) it will simply display the default of the items from all sections and categories.

param.name: set_auto
param.label: Set auto
param.description: By setting to y (yes) the module will automatically detect the Section/Category of the items page where it is located and it will display the Items for that particular section/category. If it is on a section display page it will display items from the section; on a category display page it will display the items from the category; on a item page it will display the items from the category. For non items pages (front page, component pages, typed content pages) it will simply display the default of the items from all sections and categories.

param.name: use_modify_date
param.label: Use modify date instead of create
param.description: By setting to y (yes) the module will use modification date instead of createtion for sorting, filtering anddisplaying

param.name: show_date
param.label: Show date
param.description: Choose whether you wish to have the Date of the items visible.

param.name: format_date
param.label: Date format
param.description: Controls the format that the date will be displayed in. Uses the formatting and specifiers of php (a full list is included at the end of this file). Default is %d %b %y

param.name: show_category
param.label: Show category
param.description: Choose whether you wish to have the Category of the items visible.

param.name: link_category
param.label: Link category
param.description: Control whether the Category of the Item is a clickable url that links to the Category.

param.name: text_hover_category
param.label: Text hover category
param.description: The hover text that is displayed for the Category link of each items.

param.name: text_hover_more_category
param.label: Text hover more from category
param.description: View more from Category ->

param.name: show_section
param.label: Show section
param.description: You can choose whether you wish to have the Section of the items visible.

param.name: link_section
param.label: Link section
param.description: Control whether the Section of the Item is a clickable url that links to the Section.

param.name: text_hover_section
param.label: Text hover section
param.description: The hover text that is displayed for the Section link of each items.

param.name: text_hover_more_section
param.label: Text hover more from section
param.description: The hover text that is displayed for the More link of the whole module.

param.name: show_more_auto
param.label: Show more section/category auto
param.description: You can choose whether to have a More link at the bottom of the module, which links to the section/category of the page - it automatically determines from the page whether to show a link to a section or a category. If it is on a section display page it will display a More link to the section; on a category display page it will display a More link to the category; on a item page it will display a More link to the category.

param.name: text_more
param.label: Text more
param.description: The text that is displayed for the more link of the whole module.

param.name: show_author
param.label: Show author
param.description: You can choose whether you wish to have the Author of the items visible.

param.name: show_author_alias
param.label: Show author alias
param.description: You can choose whether you wish to have the Author Alias (and if none is available the Author) of the items visible.

param.name: show_leading
param.label: Show leading
param.description: Limit each leading items intro text to a length as specified by either length_chars_intro or length_words_intro

param.name: show_leading_date
param.label: Show leading_date
param.description: Show the date for each leading item.

param.name: show_leading_readmore
param.label: Show leading readmore
param.description: Show a readmore link for each leading item

param.name: set_count_leading
param.label: Set count leading
param.description: Specify the Number of leading articles.

param.name: show_title
param.label: Show title
param.description: You can choose whether you wish to have the Title of the items visible.

param.name: show_title_nextline
param.label: Show title nextline
param.description: You can choose whether you wish to have the Title of the items split over two lines - this is useful for items with long titles.

param.name: link_title
param.label: Link title
param.description: Control whether the Title of the Item is a clickable url that links to the item.

param.name: text_hover_title
param.label: Text hover title
param.description: The hover text that is displayed for the Title link of each items.

param.name: filter_title
param.label: Filter title
param.description: Removes any html formatting and special characters in the intro text. Useful if you are having problems using limit_intro because of the html formatting in the text

param.name: limit_title
param.label: Limit title
param.description: You can choose whether to limit the length of the Title that is displayed. This is useful when you have very long Titles.

param.name: length_chars_title
param.label: Length chars title
param.description: This limits the length of Title of each item that is displayed, in terms of number of characters.

param.name: length_words_title
param.label: Length words title
param.description: This limits the length of Title of each item that is displayed, in terms of number of words.

param.name: show_intro
param.label: Show intro
param.description: You can choose whether you wish to have the Intro text of the items visible.

param.name: link_intro
param.label: Link intro
param.description: Control whether the Intro Text of the Item is a clickable url that links to the item.

param.name: filter_intro
param.label: Filter intro
param.description: Removes any html formatting and special characters in the intro text. Useful if you are having problems using limit_intro because of the html formatting in the text

param.name: limit_intro
param.label: Limit intro
param.description: You can choose whether to limit the length of the intro text that is displayed. This is useful when you have very long intro text.

param.name: length_chars_intro
param.label: Length chars intro
param.description: This limits the length of Intro Text of each item that is displayed, in terms of number of characters.

param.name: length_words_intro
param.label: Length words intro
param.description: This limits the length of Intro Text of each item that is displayed, in terms of number of words.

param.name: show_full
param.label: Show full
param.description: You can choose whether you wish to have the Full text (body) of the items visible.

param.name: filter_full
param.label: Filter full
param.description: Removes any html formatting and special characters in the full text. Useful if you are having problems using limit_full because of the html formatting in the text

param.name: limit_full
param.label: Limit full
param.description: You can choose whether to limit the length of the intro text that is displayed. This is useful when you have very long full text.

param.name: length_chars_full
param.label: Length chars full
param.description: This sets the character length of Full Text of each item that is displayed, in terms of number of characters.

param.name: length_words_full
param.label: Length words full
param.description: This sets the character length of Full Text of each item that is displayed, in terms of number of words.

param.name: use_css
param.label: Use CSS
param.description: You can decide whether you want to use the dedicated css file for the module:

param.name: css_prefix
param.label: CSS prefix
param.description: The ability to add a prefix to the css classes used by the module. This will allow, individual styles to be applied to individual modules. To better identify these different classes an underscore _ is added to the prefix name you enter.

param.name: show_mosimage
param.label: Show {mosimage}
param.description: You can choose whether you wish to have any in the items visible.

param.name: show_arrow
param.label: Show arrow
param.description: You can choose whether you wish to have an arrow icon in front of the Title of each item.

param.name: show_list
param.label: Show list
param.description: You can choose whether you wish to have an ordered list number in front of the Title of each item.

param.name: text_module_title
param.label: Text module title
param.description: Allows you to write a custom title for the module if you do not wish to use its existing module title.

param.name: text_module_link_title
param.label: Text module link title
param.description: Allow to have linkable url at bottom of the module

param.name: text_module_link_url
param.label: Text module link url
param.description: This control the url link for the link at the bottom of the module

param.name: text_module_desciption
param.label: Text module desciption
param.description: Allows you to write a custom description for the module

param.name: show_title_auto
param.label: Title auto
param.description: You can choose whether to have an automated Title top of the module, which displays the name of the section/category of the page - it automatically determines from the page whether to show the name of the section or a category. If it is on a section display page it will display the name of the section; on a category display page it will display the name of the category; on a item page it will display the name of the category.

param.name: text_title_auto_pre
param.label: Text title auto prefix
param.description: The prefix text that goes before the auto selected Section/Category name.

param.name: text_title_auto_suf
param.label: Text title auto suffix
param.description: The suffix text that goes before the auto selected Section/Category name.

param.name: show_readmore
param.label: Show readmore
param.description: You can choose whether to have a Read More link for the items visible.

param.name: text_readmore
param.label: Text readmore
param.description: The text that is displayed for the Readmore link of each items.

param.name: text_hover_readmore
param.label: Text hover readmore
param.description: The hover text that is displayed for the Readmore link of each items.

param.name: access_public
param.label: Access public
param.description: Display all Items that have been set to Public Access

param.name: access_registered
param.label: Access registered
param.description: Display all Items that have been set to Registered Access

param.name: access_special
param.label: Access special
param.description: Display all Items that have been set to Special Access

param.name: scroll
param.label: Scroll
param.description: The ability to have the module output scroll in a direction and speed determined by 4 Display Modifier Parameters.

param.name: scroll_direction
param.label: Scroll direction
param.description: You can choose in which direction the module data will be scrolled.

param.name: scroll_speed
param.label: Scroll speed
param.description: The scrolling speed in pixels. The higher the number the quicker the speed.

param.name: scroll_delay
param.label: Scroll delay
param.description: The delay in displaying/refreshing the scrolling data in milliseconds. The lower the number the quicker the speed.

param.name: scroll_height
param.label: Scroll_height
param.description: The height of the scroll window in pixels.

param.name: notfound_message
param.label: Empty select message
param.description: Print error message if no rows found
